name: Freddy Fazbear
description: The lead singer and mascot of Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. Becomes more active in later nights.
behavior: Approaches through the right hallway, mostly at night 3-5.
voice_lines: You won't get away with this!

name: Bonnie
description: The purple animatronic rabbit who plays guitar. Very active from the start.
behavior: Moves through the left hallway, frequent early night visits.

name: Chica
description: The yellow chicken animatronic who loves pizza. Moves through the right hallway.
behavior: Appears mostly in the kitchen and right hallway.

name: Foxy
description: The animatronic fox hiding in Pirate Cove. Runs down the hallway if left unchecked.
behavior: Sprints towards the office if Pirate Cove camera is neglected.

name: Golden Freddy
description: A ghostly version of Freddy that appears randomly and can crash the game.
behavior: Appears suddenly in the office, teleporting and causing hallucinations.

name: Phone Guy
description: The former night guard who leaves recorded messages to help the player.
behavior: Provides tips and lore through phone calls.
voice_lines: Hello? Hello? Uh, I wanted to record a message for you to help you get settled in on your first night.
Remember to conserve power by checking the cameras and doors sparingly.
